YouWillNotBeAbleToUseNameGen: You will not be able to use the name generator if the template is empty.
NameGenExplanation: You can use the following main placeholders here: 's' means syllable; 'v' means single vowel; 'V' means vowel or vowel combination. 'c' means single consonant, 'B' single constant for beginning of a word, 'C' single consonant for the end of a word. The algorithmus is based on the description of RinkWorks. You can find more information here and here.
NameGenFixErrorInTemplateBeforeSaving: You have to fix the error in the template before beeing able to save it.
Name: Name
DropImageHere: Drop image for npc here or click to choose an image
AreYouSureYouWantToRemoveTheItem: Are you sure you want to remove the item?
AreYouSureYouWantToRemoveTheSkill: Are you sure you want to remove the skill?
MarkedInMapNTimes: Npc is marked in the map {{0}} times. No zoom on marker is possible.
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheObject: Are you sure you want to delete the npc?
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete the template?
AreYouSureYouWantToMarkTheNpcAsPlayer: Are you sure you want to mark the npc as the player?
LockedTemplatePrefix: The template is currently beeing edited by
LockedObjectPrefix: The npc is currently beeing edited by
